page.title: 13LIFE STYLES 3
page.content: In Weeley there is an Ambulance Station which is 15 years old. We went to the Station to interview the men there and they gave us information about themselves and the Station. They have 2 shift vehicles, 3 day vehicles, 8 shift workers, 6 day workers, 3 reliefs and 1 Station Officer. The shifts go from 7am to 3pm; 3pm to 11pm; 10.30am to 6.30pm and 8am to 5pm. The first man we interviewed had for breakfast Weetabix, toast, and a cup of tea. He had worked at the Station for 10 years and was very happy. His favourite food are salads, casseroles, fish, rice and roasts. His favourite drink is coffee. Like most people we talked to, he thinks that the people of Weeley are very friendly and sociable.
